The luggage tag can be attached to clothing such as a backpack, jacket or belt to add a unique touch and keep track of personal belongings in a crowded area.
The luggage tag can be used to temporarily label objects such as luggage identification straps around suitcases during travel.
Luggage tags can be used to mark a specific area or zone within a room or facility, such as the entrance only zone for important documents.
Attach a luggage tag to a book or a folder to easily locate and recognize it in a cluttered environment.
The luggage tag can be used as a temporary paperweight for loose papers or documents.
